author: The Irish Times
title: Coronavirus: More than 2.2 million cases reported worldwide
description: Spain reaches 20,000 deaths as Trump insists deaths much higher in China than in US
content: More than 2.26 million people have been reported to be infected by coronavirus globally and 154,613 have died, according to a Reuters tally. Infections have been reported in more than 210 countries and territories since the first cases were identified in Chin… [+9544 chars]
